Item ID26231

Nihil shards are an item dropped by all NPCs in the Ancient Prison.

When used with a pestle and mortar, the nihil shard becomes nihil dust, which can be mixed with an unfinished dwarf weed potion at level 85 Herblore to make an ancient brew.

250 Nihil shards are required to create a Zaryte crossbow.

[[File:Nihil shard detail.png|left|110px]]
'''Nihil shards''' are an item dropped by all NPCs in the [[Ancient Prison]].

When used with a [[pestle and mortar]], the nihil shard becomes [[nihil dust]], which can be mixed with an [[Dwarf weed potion (unf)|unfinished dwarf weed potion]] at level 85 [[Herblore]] to make an [[ancient brew]].

250 Nihil shards are required to create a [[Zaryte crossbow]].
